author: vmassol
msg: Updated plugin tests to verify we can generate the dashboard report by using the multiproject:site goal. Also updated documentation accordingly.

author: vmassol
msg: Do not execute Clover if there are no tests to run Clover on. This prevents an error happening in the clover:on goal.

author: vmassol
msg: Allow generating XML and/or Swing reports during the web site generation too.

author: vmassol
msg: When executing multiproject:site, generate the top level site after the subprojects site have been generated. This is required if the top level site generation depends on subproject site generation information.

author: dion
msg: Use issue attribute where possible for better reporting
